alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 2:12PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Camas Prairie zone and along Highway 20. * WHEN...From 11 AM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. Whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
